items.title: Chatting with Documents Using Open-Source Large Language Models (LLMs)
items.content_html:
Below are some repositories that allow you to chat with documents using open-source LLMs.

  1. Langchain’s GPT-4 PDF Chatbot
  2. PDFChat on Hugging Face
  3. PrivateGPT
  4. LocalGPT
  5. Local Llama
  6. BrainChulo
  7. LocalAI
  8. Langchain’s Hugging Face Integration
items.content_text:
Below are some repositories that allow you to chat with documents using open-source LLMs.

1. [Langchain's GPT-4 PDF Chatbot](https://github.com/mayooear/gpt4-pdf-chatbot-langchain)
2. [PDFChat on Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/spaces/fakezeta/pdfchat)
3. [PrivateGPT](https://github.com/imartinez/privateGPT)
4. [LocalGPT](https://github.com/PromtEngineer/localGPT)
5. [Local Llama](https://github.com/jlonge4/local_llama)
6. [BrainChulo](https://github.com/iGavroche/BrainChulo)
7. [LocalAI](https://reddit.com/r/selfhosted)
8. [Langchain's Hugging Face Integration](https://python.langchain.com/en/latest/modules/models/llms/integrations/huggingface_textgen_inference.html)

items.content_html: “I hope that you never, not even for a second, become a secondary character in your own story.”
items.content_text: "I hope that you never, not even for a second, become a secondary character in your own story."

items.content_html: The problem with doing nothing is not knowing when you’re finished.
items.content_text: > The problem with doing nothing is not knowing when you’re finished.

items.content_html: The cost of not following your heart is spending the rest of your life wishing you had.
items.content_text: The cost of not following your heart is spending the rest of your life wishing you had.

items.content_html: Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can.
items.content_text: Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can.

items.content_html: Loving someone who doesn’t love you back is like hugging a cactus. The tighter you hold on the more it hurts.
items.content_text: > Loving someone who doesn’t love you back is like hugging a cactus. The tighter you hold on the more it hurts.

items.content_html: “Pain has a way of clipping our wings and keeping us from being able to fly.”
items.content_text: > “Pain has a way of clipping our wings and keeping us from being able to fly.”

items.content_html: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
items.content_text: > Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

items.content_html: The problem with doing nothing is not knowing when you’re finished.
items.content_text: > The problem with doing nothing is not knowing when you’re finished.

items.content_html: Time to do some main character stuff
items.content_text: Time to do some main character stuff

items.content_html: The average human lifespan is absurdly, insultingly brief. Assuming you live to be eighty, you have just over four thousand weeks.
items.content_text: The average human lifespan is absurdly, insultingly brief. Assuming you live to be eighty, you have just over four thousand weeks.
